title: Implement CollectionView (similar to iOS control, 2d listview of different elements) in WPF without xaml islands
body: Implement CollectionView (2d listview of different elements) in WPF without xaml islands

comments.body: The WPF source code is being open sourced on GitHub. Feel free to post WPF issues/suggestions here: https://github.com/dotnet/wpf/
